div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 959 Burgas district, Bulgaria, 1966 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (Price) Contents: 132+ AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 131 late post. tetradr. (Mesembria 86, Odessus 45) Lysimachus: 1 late post. tetradr. (By- zantium) Disposition: dispersed Gerasimov, BIAB 30 (1967), p. 187
